traits.Magic Resistance: The death knight has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Marshal Undead: Unless the death knight is incapacitated, it and undead creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

actions.Multiattack: The death knight makes three longsword attacks.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +11+1d12 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) necrotic damage.
actions.Hellfire Orb (1/Day): The death knight hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 18+1d12 + 12 Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 35 (10d6) fire damage and 35 (10d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
